name: ASTROPOCALYPSE
description:
The fastest 4X there is!

(the name was generated automatically)

In this game where you have to colonize planets faster than the giant black hole sucks them in!

Your civilization was forsed into the very center of the galaxy, and now you have to use all that you have to survive. Fight against the nature’s cycle, colonize, mine, research, and finally escape!

Features:

  • Exciting gameplay
  • Random planet and names generation
  • Research tree
  • Constant anxiety and fear of asteroids
  • Three possible endings
  • Cool looks
  • Tutorial (yeah, it is a feature)

Authors:

  • Artish357
  • Mirtrix

Credits for custom assets:

  • Joystix Font by Raymond Larabie
  • Orange Kid Font  by Raymond Larabie
  • Icons from Game-icons.net made by Delapouite, Lorc, Faithtoken and Skoll
